text: kraoyomk yeung ban bratan kompir( ta v rt) aoy mousaea daembi bampenh( nie k meat) ning athibbeay nouv real kechchakar yeang chbasa leasa ning chea kar changaoulobangheanh haeyning chea kdei me tda krounea samreab anak del sang ampeula sangkhumtha puokke mean chomnue nung kar chuob mcheasa robsa puokke( thngai barlok)
